Package org.daisy.pipeline.modules

Modules are resource sets which may include xpl, xslt, css, schemas or any other kind of file grouped under a common name and version.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ModuleRef  
    ModuleRegistry
    ModuleRegistry offers the functionality to enregister and query for the modules loaded.
    ResourceLoader
    The Interface ResourceLoader allows to get an accessible URI from the path provided.

    Component
    Module component now based on expath package components.
    Entity

    JarModuleBuilder

    Daisy pipeline module holds a set of components accesible via their uri, its name, version and dependencies.
    OSGIModuleBuilder  

Package org.daisy.pipeline.modules Description

Modules are resource sets which may include xpl, xslt, css, schemas or any other kind of file grouped under a common name and version. Every module makes its resources available as components, these components are public URI / systemId pairs which allow any other module make use of the resources by just accessing the component's public resource identifier.
